_metadata.prd_section: P1 - Web Interface and Advanced Features
_metadata.description: HTTP API, web interface, and advanced campaign management features

requirements.title: HTTP API Endpoints
requirements.description: Provide HTTP API endpoints for web interface and external integrations with CRUD operations for campaigns

validation.notes: Tests validate HTTP API CRUD operations: TestCreateCampaignHandler, TestGetCampaignHandler, TestUpdateCampaignHandler, TestDeleteCampaignHandler, TestListCampaignsHandler [REQ:VT-REQ-006]
Tests validate HTTP server functionality: TestCorsMiddleware, TestHealthHandler, TestOptionsHandler [REQ:VT-REQ-006]
E2E workflow validates HTTP API CRUD operations end-to-end [REQ:VT-REQ-006]

requirements.title: File Prioritization API
requirements.description: Provide sorted lists of least visited and most stale files to guide agent analysis workflows

validation.notes: Tests validate prioritization queries: TestLeastVisitedHandler, TestMostStaleHandler [REQ:VT-REQ-007]
E2E workflow validates file prioritization through staleness scoring [REQ:VT-REQ-007]
E2E UI workflow validates dashboard visualization of prioritized files [REQ:VT-REQ-007]

requirements.title: Campaign Export/Import API
requirements.description: Export and import campaign data for backup, sharing, and migration between environments

validation.notes: Tests validate export functionality: TestExportHandler, TestExportHandlerComprehensive [REQ:VT-REQ-008]
TestImportHandler validates campaign import and data preservation [REQ:VT-REQ-008]
HTTP API integration tests validate export/import endpoints

requirements.title: Web Interface Dashboard
requirements.description: Build web interface for manual campaign management and visualization of staleness metrics

validation.notes: Tests validate HTTP endpoints that power the UI dashboard: TestListCampaignsHandler, TestGetCampaignHandler [REQ:VT-REQ-009]
Tests validate coverage metrics for dashboard: TestCoverageHandler, TestCoverageHandlerErrorPaths [REQ:VT-REQ-009]
E2E UI workflow validates dashboard page load, campaigns list, and accessibility [REQ:VT-REQ-009]

requirements.title: Campaign Detail View
requirements.description: Provide detailed campaign view with file list, staleness visualization, and visit tracking

validation.notes: Unit tests validate campaign detail retrieval and display data [REQ:VT-REQ-010]
E2E UI workflow validates campaign dashboard and detail view components [REQ:VT-REQ-010]
